channel.title: Server Help Thread
channel.description:
Well this thread will have any basic questions asked here. Before posting you should read this and day by day hopefully I will be adding new questions and answers here categorized. Well this is just the opening of the thread. I will be updating daily. So here are some already :P.
Q: Why doesn't my compiler work? A: Ok if you haven't already downloaded JDK, you will need that. When you download it, it will tell you the version, replace your compilers version to yours. If it still doesn't work, after "Program Files" try putting "Program Files (x86)" if it works that means your computer is a 32 bit.
Q: How do I make shops? A: [Delta] go to the config folder and open up the file named "shops.cfg" And it should look something like this - shop # @red@durr_shop 2 2 item amount item amount
[PI] same thing, open up shops.cfg, and yea.
Will be updating soon, going to grab a bite to eat.

item.title: Server Help Thread
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Well this thread will have any basic questions asked here. Before posting you should read this and day by day hopefully I will be adding new questions and answers here categorized. Well this is just the opening of the thread. I will be updating daily. So here are some already :P.

Q: Why doesn’t my compiler work?
A: Ok if you haven’t already downloaded JDK, you will need that. When you download it, it will tell you the version, replace your compilers version to yours. If it still doesn’t work, after “Program Files” try putting “Program Files (x86)” if it works that means your computer is a 32 bit.

Q: How do I make shops?
A: [Delta] go to the config folder and open up the file named “shops.cfg”
And it should look something like this -
shop # @red@durr_shop 2 2 item amount item amount

[PI] same thing, open up shops.cfg, and yea.

Will be updating soon, going to grab a bite to eat.

Read full topic
